full_text:
There is hereby established an Environmental Advisory Board (hereinafter referred to as the Board) for the purpose of advising the City Council on maters related to the environment on which the Council deems it appropriate or necessary to receive advice. The Board will conduct only activities specifically referred to it by City Council. 
(Ord. No. 2006-56, §1, 6-20-06)

plain_text:
CODE OF STATE

BOARD CREATED. (§ 1-4011)

There is hereby established an Environmental Advisory Board (hereinafter
referred to as the Board) for the purpose of advising the City Council on maters
related to the environment on which the Council deems it appropriate or
necessary to receive advice. The Board will conduct only activities specifically
referred to it by City Council. 
(Ord. No. 2006-56, §1, 6-20-06)
